DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Single-Dose , Four-Period , Four-Treatment , Cross-Over , Single-Center , Phase I , Crossover Study Healthy Japanese Adult Subjects Evaluate Safety Pharmacokinetics Two Doses PT003 Two Doses PT001 .
DOC.brief_title: PK Study PT003 PT001 Japanese Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) prior study related procedure Male female first generation Japanese subject 18 45 year , inclusive Good general health Medically acceptable contraception woman childbearing potential male female partner childbearing potential Clinical lab within normal range determine clinically significant Investigator Pregnancy , nurse female subject , subject try conceive Clinically significant neurologic , cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , endocrinologic , pulmonary , hematological , psychiatric , medical illness would interfere participation study History ECG abnormalities Cancer complete remission least 5 year Clinically significant , symptomatic prostatic hypertrophy Male subject transurethral resection prostate full resection prostate within 6 month prior Screening Clinically significant bladder neck obstruction urinary retention Inadequately treat glaucoma History allergic reaction hypersensitivity drug component formulation use study Subjects preexist anemia and/or iron deficiency
